name: Flat maze
description:
What is it:

Demo to display thousands-particle collision logic, source code available on my github link

On this page you can downlaod exe-version for Windows.

Also this game work very good in webbtowser (WebGL2), without downloading, try web-version. (link below)

Game has no sound.

Gameplay:

Goal is finish maze (top right corner). Player has HP, monsters move to plaeyer.

Control:

Keyboard w/a/s/d or arrows, and mosue left/right click.

Web version: 

Link https://danilw.itch.io/flat-maze-web
